and.attribute: Production Assistant Manager (new Factory) job - VietnamWorks
Please send your CV to huong.nguyen@navigossearch.com

The jobholder will be responsible for the following duties and responsibilities: - Main line production management. - Workforces management of each section - Equipment maintenance - Controlling production status - Line organization management (operator, leader, section leader) ....

- Local Vietnamese - Male, 28-32 years old - 5 years working experience in which have experience at supervisor or Assistant Manager level - Experience in operating a production line in large foreign invested manufacturing company - Understanding of electronics industry and have good production knowledge - Organization management experience Attractive remuneration package including competitive salary, fixed and variable bonus, allowances and excellent working environment will be offered to successful candidate. Activities of the company intend to create a respectful workplace in which every individual has the opportunity to reach his or her highest potential. * Interested parties are invited to forward detailed resume in English by click "APPLY NOW"

and.attribute: Navigos Search is the leading, most experienced and highly qualified executive recruitment firm in Vietnam. Our mission is to help people and companies achieve their dream. We do this by matching talented individuals to the jobs for which they are best suited, ensuring that our clients have the right people on board that they need to succeed, and our candidates land the job of their dream. We accomplish this mission thanks to our strong expertise in local labor market, an established and broad network of clients and candidates and a proven recruitment method of international standards.
